admins.name: Hasham Ahmad
admins.title: First Co-President
admins.description: Rising senior at Jean Augustine Secondary School and one of the original three founders of Brampton FBLC. Leads strategic acquisitions and cross-organizational leadership initiatives.

admins.name: Piraneerth Pathmajeyalan
admins.title: Second Co-President
admins.description: Sci-Tech student at Chinguacousy Secondary School and one of the three original founders. Focuses on community building and member engagement initiatives.

admins.name: Christina Guo
admins.title: Secretary
admins.description: Christina Guo is a rising senior at Agincourt Collegiate Institute and proudly serves as the Secretary to the First Co-President and Chief of Staff of Brampton FBLC, JEC & TA. She's committed to leadership and creating engaging, inclusive experiences for members.

admins.name: Deetya Amuluru
admins.title: Vice-President
admins.description: Dedicated student leader focused on organizational strategy and member development. Brings fresh perspectives to executive decision-making processes.

admins.name: Garvit Chada
admins.title: Executive Director
admins.description: Oversees all organizational operations and ensures seamless coordination between departments. Passionate about creating impactful business learning experiences.

operations.name: Sarah Chen
operations.title: Operations Manager
operations.description: Manages day-to-day operations and ensures smooth coordination between all departments. Specializes in process optimization and team efficiency.

operations.name: Marcus Thompson
operations.title: Project Coordinator
operations.description: Coordinates cross-departmental projects and manages timelines. Expert in agile methodologies and team collaboration tools.

operations.name: Elena Rodriguez
operations.title: Resource Manager
operations.description: Manages organizational resources and budget allocation. Ensures optimal resource utilization across all initiatives.

operations.name: David Kim
operations.title: Quality Assurance Lead
operations.description: Ensures high standards across all FBLC programs and initiatives. Focuses on continuous improvement and member satisfaction.

education.name: Dr. Amanda Foster
education.title: Education Director
education.description: Leads curriculum development and educational programming. PhD in Business Education with 10+ years of experience in youth development.

education.name: James Patterson
education.title: Workshop Coordinator
education.description: Designs and facilitates business workshops and training sessions. Specializes in entrepreneurship and leadership development.

education.name: Lisa Wang
education.title: Curriculum Specialist
education.description: Develops age-appropriate business curriculum and learning materials. Expert in experiential learning methodologies.

education.name: Michael Johnson
education.title: Mentorship Coordinator
education.description: Connects students with industry professionals and manages mentorship programs. Builds bridges between education and real-world application.

recruitment.name: Sophia Martinez
recruitment.title: Recruitment Director
recruitment.description: Leads talent acquisition and member onboarding processes. Passionate about building diverse and inclusive communities.

recruitment.name: Alex Cooper
recruitment.title: Community Outreach Lead
recruitment.description: Manages outreach initiatives and community partnerships. Builds relationships with schools and local organizations.

recruitment.name: Priya Patel
recruitment.title: Service Learning Coordinator
recruitment.description: Coordinates community service projects and social impact initiatives. Integrates service learning with business education.

recruitment.name: Jordan Williams
recruitment.title: Member Experience Manager
recruitment.description: Ensures positive member experiences and manages retention programs. Focuses on member engagement and satisfaction.

special.name: Rachel Green
special.title: Events Director
special.description: Plans and executes special events, competitions, and networking opportunities. Creates memorable experiences that build community.

special.name: Kevin Liu
special.title: Technology Innovation Lead
special.description: Oversees technology initiatives and digital transformation projects. Integrates cutting-edge tools into FBLC operations.

special.name: Maya Singh
special.title: Partnership Development Manager
special.description: Develops strategic partnerships with businesses and educational institutions. Expands opportunities for members through external relationships.

special.name: Carlos Mendez
special.title: Innovation Lab Director
special.description: Leads experimental programs and pilot initiatives. Explores new ways to deliver business education and skill development.

marketing.name: Taylor Brooks
marketing.title: Marketing Director
marketing.description: Leads brand strategy and marketing communications. Expert in digital marketing and youth engagement strategies.

marketing.name: Nina Sharma
marketing.title: Social Media Manager
marketing.description: Manages all social media channels and digital content creation. Builds online community and engagement across platforms.

marketing.name: Ryan O'Connor
marketing.title: Content Creator
marketing.description: Produces educational content, videos, and marketing materials. Specializes in storytelling and visual communication.

marketing.name: Zoe Abdullah
marketing.title: Brand Ambassador Coordinator
marketing.description: Manages student ambassador program and peer-to-peer marketing initiatives. Empowers students to be brand advocates.

juniors.name: Emma Thompson
juniors.title: Junior Program Director
juniors.description: Develops and oversees programs specifically designed for younger members. Creates age-appropriate business learning experiences.

juniors.name: Noah Davis
juniors.title: Peer Mentor Lead
juniors.description: Coordinates peer mentoring programs and student leadership development. Bridges the gap between junior and senior members.

juniors.name: Ava Wilson
juniors.title: Junior Activities Coordinator
juniors.description: Plans and executes activities and events for junior members. Focuses on fun, engaging ways to learn business fundamentals.

juniors.name: Liam Zhang
juniors.title: Skills Development Specialist
juniors.description: Develops foundational business skills programs for junior members. Creates pathways for skill progression and growth.
